entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,63001}Oho, perfect timing. That room over{F801}there looks like a fine place to take{F801}a rest.{F801}{F802}{F87B,4,10,1,1}{F813,0,63002}My demons have been pestering me to{F801}let them heal themselves.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,63010}This is a weapon called a "gun."{F801}It fires projectiles called "bullets"{F801}to kill enemies at a distance.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,0,63013}You don't have to worry about that.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,63014}I'll automatically send data on the{F801}relics you find to the Monastery.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,63015}That frees you up to keep your focus{F801}on the mission.{F801}
